title: Book Bite #11: What Would the World Be Like Without Email?
description:
In “A World Without Email: Reimagining Work in an Age of Communication Overload” (#11 in our countdown of last year’s most popular Book Bites), Cal Newport doesn’t just dare to imagine a future where new forms of streamlined digital communication replace endless email threads and haphazard messaging. He says that future is inevitable. The question is: Will you be ready for it?
Episode Recommendation:
EMAIL: Would the World Be Better Without It?
